songs.title: Feels Like Rain
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Woke up a little late today
Looking out, the clouds are grey
Got no missed phone calls from you
Still your picture by my bed
Still the one I want instead
But I can't find a way to say...

[Pre-Chorus]
Come back (Come back)
You make up what I lack
My pride has left me all alone
It's getting so cold

[Chorus]
I'm closing the windows to stay warm
It's a chill in my soul since you've been gone
The silence is louder than any thunder
Taking me under, oh
I'm staying home today
Gonna hide away
'Cause it feels (It feels) like (It feels like) rain

[Refrain]
Do you know what it feels like?
Do you know what it feels like?
Do you know what it feels like when it feels like rain?

[Verse 2]
Every day just seems the same
And I'm the only one to blame
I tried to play like I'm fine (But I)
But the pain is here to stay
That your love has washed away
It falls and runs down the drain

[Pre-Chorus]
Come back (Come back)
You make up what I lack
My pride has left me all alone
It's getting so cold

[Chorus]
I'm closing the windows to stay warm
It's a chill in my soul since you've been gone
The silence is louder than any thunder
Taking me under, oh
I'm staying home today
Gonna hide away
'Cause it feels (It feels) like (It feels like) rain

[Bridge]
At some point (At some point), this darkness (Darkness) is bound to fade today (Today)
It's so hard (So hard) to believe (Believe) this storm will ever go away

[Chorus]
I'm closing the windows to stay warm
It's a chill in my soul since you've been gone
The silence is louder than any thunder
Taking me under, oh
I'm staying home today
Gonna hide away
'Cause it feels (It feels) like (It feels like) rain

[Outro]
Do you know what it feels like?
Do you know what it feels like?
Do you know what it feels like?
It feels like rain
Do you know what it feels like?
Do you know what it feels like?
Do you know what it feels like when it feels like rain?
